item.title: Anne Hathaway’s Colleen Hoover Thriller ‘Verity’ Moves to Fall 2026 Release
item.description: Dakota Johnson and Josh Hartnett also star in Michael Showalter’s feature adaptation of Hoover’s bestseller.
